trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> class is a collection of service principal names that represent a configuration element for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Класс <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> представляет коллекцию имен участника-службы, представляющих элемент конфигурации для объекта <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to add to this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />, который нужно добавить в данную коллекцию <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method adds a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> добавляет экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> к этому объекту <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method ignores a duplicate name provided in the `element` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> Метод игнорирует повторяющееся имя в `element` параметра.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class is a collection of Service Principal Names (SPNs) that represent a configuration element for an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> Класс — это совокупность имена участника-службы (SPN), который представляет элемент конфигурации для <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Clear" /> method removes all configuration element objects from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Clear" /> удаляет все объекты элементов конфигурации из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to retrieve the index of in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />, индекс которого нужно получить в данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.IndexOf(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method retrieves the index of the specified configuration element in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.IndexOf(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> извлекает индекс указанного элемента конфигурации в данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Индекс указанного объекта <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> в данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item" /> property gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance
trans-unit.target: Свойство <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item" /> получает или задает экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Индекс экземпляра <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> в данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> property gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Свойство <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> получает или задает экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> по указанному расположению в индексе.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance requested.
trans-unit.target: Запрошенный экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />.

trans-unit.source: If the requested instance is not found, then <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Если запрошенный экземпляр не найден, возвращается <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance in this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.String" />, представляющий экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> в данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> property gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance based on a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Свойство <see cref="P:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Item(System.String)" /> получает или задает экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> на основе строки, представляющей экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance requested.
trans-unit.target: Запрошенный экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />.

trans-unit.source: If the requested instance is not found, then <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Если запрошенный экземпляр не найден, возвращается <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="Overload:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove" /> удаляет экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to remove from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />, который следует удалить из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> удаляет экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Свойство <paramref name="element" /> имеет значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to remove from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />
trans-unit.target: Строка <see cref="T:System.String" />, представляющая экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />, который следует удалить из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> based on the <see cref="T:System.String" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> удаляет экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> на основе заданной строки <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance to remove from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Индекс экземпляра <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" />, удаляемого из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> method removes a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance from this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> based on the index specified.
trans-unit.target: Метод <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Remove(System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement)" /> удаляет экземпляр <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> из данной коллекции <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> на основе заданного индекса.
